overview: Lucia, an children's book author, tells the story of her husband's disappearance. One day on their way to Brazil he just disappears. She goes to the police, gets a ransom note, and makes friends with the old dude downstairs and the young dude upstairs as she tries to find him. Things take a bit of a twist as she realized the kidnapping may not be as simple as it seems on the surface.

production_companies.name: Fondo para la Producción Cinematográfica de Calidad
Consejo Nacional para la cultura y las artes

tagline: She's on an adventure that could change her life... if she doesn't turn back
title: Lucía, Lucía
